title: FS: Graded Off Backs, Sov 460, Old Mill, New cards added ***ALL SOLD***
author: Scott L.

posts.post_title: FS: Graded Off Backs, Sov 460, Old Mill, New cards added ***ALL SOLD***
posts.post_content:
A few affordable off backs FS. Prices are net to me and delivered with tracking. SOLD here or via PM trumps any offers or negotiations. 

SGC 2.5 Jiggs Donohue Sovereign. One of the cards in the set that only comes with one off back. It’s Sovereign or nothing. Fairly low pop as well. Really nice card.  $135 ***SOLD***

SGC 1.5 Camnitz Hands Above Head Sovereign 460. Tougher 460 series back. $95 ***SOLD***

SGC 2 Camnitz arm at side Old Mill. $85 ***SOLD***

SGC 2 Stoney McGlynn Sovereign. Tough lower pop (12) card. Difficult off back as he really only has Cycle and AB in addition to Sovereign and they are very tough. $95 ***SOLD***

SGC 1.5 Bob Spade tougher Sovereign 150 series back $95 ***SOLD***

PSA 2 Heinie Berger Sovereign 350 back $80 ***SOLD***

Thanks for looking!
